definitions.definition: A specification of an object or process, referring to requirements to be satisfied and thus conditions to be met for them to solve a problem.
A plan (with more or less detail) for the structure and functions of an artifact, building or system.
examples: The initial design of the park was rejected for being too expensive.

definitions.definition: A pattern , as an element of a work of art or architecture.
examples: We're working on some new designs for our range of summer shirts

definitions.definition: The composition of a work of art.

examples: We have designs on winning the league next season.
To be hateful of the truth by design .

definitions.definition: The shape or appearance given to an object, especially one that is intended to make it more attractive.

main_definition: A specification of an object or process, referring to requirements to be satisfied and thus conditions to be met for them to solve a problem.

The shape or appearance given to an object, especially one that is intended to make it more attractive.
